name: Braking News
description:
A game about trying to delivery newspapers, drifting, and utter carnage.

Steer with A and D, spin yourself out of sticky situations with Space.

Shoot papers with the mouse!

Restart with Enter!

I hope you enjoy it! 

P.S. you can do donuts!
